name: Wing 1 + 4
description:
> *A Pact squad has gone missing in northern Maguuma, and you and your allies are their only hope for recovery. But the deadly forest isn't the only risk to the rescue operation—the area holds dark secrets and strange magic.*

The Spirit Vale is the first released raid wing and consists of four encounters:
<:valeguardian:703930901997944833> **Vale Guardian** - A medium difficulty boss that takes increased power damage. 
<:spiritwoods:836193678631764009> **Spirit Woods** - An easy encounter where we have to succeed at a multitude of events.
<:gorseval:703930783198347284> **Gorseval** - An easy boss where any kind of DPS is fine.
<:sabetha:703930783320113192> **Sabetha** - A medium difficulty boss where any kind of DPS is fine.

Both power and condi DPS work for these encounters!

> *The bloodstone explosion unearthed a portal to a place where few have been—and none have escaped. Deconstruct the mysteries and learn the true story of one of history's most misunderstood figures.*

This is the fourth raid wing and probably the most beginner-friendly one in the game right now! We will have four encounters:
<:cairn:703930782003101758> **Cairn** - An easy but chaotic boss that favours condi DPS.
<:mursaat:703930783680954459> **Mursaat Overseer** - An easy boss that lets you show off your DPS rotation.
<:samarog:703930783257329714> **Samarog** - An easy CC-heavy boss that favours power DPS.
<:deimos:703930783257067551> **Deimos** - A difficult, punishing boss where any kind of DPS works.

Both power and condi DPS work for these encounters!

Let me know if you have any questions!
templateOverview: This template for a Wing 1 + 4 weekly clears
